title: Sulfur/carbon cathode material chemistry and morphology optimisation for lithium–sulfur batteries
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30743-30755
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04740K, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tayeba Safdar, Chun Huang
Lithium–sulfur batteries (LSBs) are one of promising alternative to lithium-ion batteries because sulfur is abundant and exhibits a high theoretical capacity (1675 mA h g−1).
